reviewText: You can order both movies on one DVD from walmart.com for $14.95. Weird. Who would have thought you could do that? Crazy.

Yup! This is a must-have if  you can find it on one dvd. Killer footage from the guys who made skateboarding in the 80's: Screaming Lord Salba, Hosoi, Roskopp, Jessee, Natas, Grosso, Kendall, and many others! Santa Cruz was it! Find this dvd or 2 dvd, you'll love it!
